# f-badge

A small label, generally appearing inside or in close proximity to another larger interface component, representing a status, property, or some other metadata.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description               | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `content` | `content` | the content for the badge | `string` | `undefined` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                         | Description               |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `--f-badge-background-color` | color of badge background |
| `--f-badge-border-color`     | color of badge border     |
| `--f-badge-text-color`       | color of badge text       |
